statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_impact_analysis;
SELECT product_id, date, price FROM pricing_impact_analysis WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM pricing_impact_analysis ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_volume, revenue FROM pricing_impact_analysis WHERE sales_volume < 1000;
SELECT AVG(price), MAX(revenue) FROM pricing_impact_analysis;
SELECT * FROM pricing_impact_analysis WHERE price > 100 AND sales_volume < 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales FROM pricing_impact_analysis GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM pricing_impact_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY date ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM pricing_impact_analysis GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_impact_analysis WHERE revenue >= 50000 AND price < 200 ORDER BY revenue DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, units_sold, revenue FROM sales_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sales_performance GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, units_sold, price FROM sales_performance WHERE units_sold > 100 AND price < 50.00;
SELECT sp.date, pc.change_date, pc.product_id, pc.old_price, pc.new_price, pc.reason FROM sales_performance AS sp INNER JOIN pricing_changes AS pc ON sp.product_id = pc.product_id;
SELECT product_id, price, units_sold FROM sales_performance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE units_sold > 100 AND price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;

SELECT product_id, units_sold, revenue FROM sales_performance JOIN pricing_changes ON sales_performance.product_id = pricing_changes.product_id WHERE pricing_changes.new_price > sales_performance.price ORDER BY sales_performance.revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, unit_sold, revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND units_sold < 50 ORDER BY units_sold ASC, revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, old_price, new_price, reason FROM pricing_changes WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY old_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pricing_changes WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_id, price FROM pricing_changes ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_performance WHERE quantity > 50 AND revenue > 500
SELECT product_id, profit_margin FROM profitability WHERE cost_price < 50
SELECT id, sale_id, revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE date_sold BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM pricing_changes WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_changes GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT date_sold, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_performance WHERE date_sold BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY date_sold ORDER BY date_sold;
SELECT product_id, SUM(profit_margin * cost_price) AS total_profit FROM profitability GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_profit DESC;

SELECT * FROM pricing_changes JOIN sales_performance ON pricing_changes.product_id = sales_performance.sale_id WHERE pricing_changes.price < 50 AND sales_performance.quantity > 10 ORDER BY pricing_changes.start_date ASC, sales_performance.date_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesPerformance ORDER BY date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SalesPerformance GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT date, price FROM SalesPerformance WHERE product_id = 5 AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesTrends WHERE month_year BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, AVG(profit_percent) AS avg_profit_percentage FROM SalesTrends GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_profit_percentage DESC;
SELECT id, date, product_id, price, quantity, revenue FROM SalesPerformance WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, month_year, SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales_volume FROM SalesTrends GROUP BY product_id, month_year HAVING total_sales_volume > 500 ORDER BY total_sales_volume DESC;
SELECT SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(total_costs) AS total_costs, SUM(total_profit) AS total_profit FROM ProfitabilityAnalytics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, AVG(profit_percent) AS average_profit_percent FROM SalesTrends GROUP BY product_id HAVING average_profit_percent > 20 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT id, date, product_id, old_price, new_price FROM PricingChanges WHERE new_price < old_price ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity_sold, sales_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, old_price, new_price, change_date FROM pricing_history ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_growth, profit_margin, review_date FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_growth > 0.1;
SELECT product_id, impact_metric, impact_value FROM pricing_impact WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 50 AND sales_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT sales_date, product_name, price, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
